name: Molten Horn
description: Molten Horn is a turn-based strategy rogue-like game with tactical elements. Venture through randomly generated locations, push enemies into traps, upgrade your character or assemble a team. Each run is a new challenge to defeat the fearsome Molten Horn.

name: Full Moon Rush
description: Take on a howling challenge in Full Moon Rush! This classic shoot 'em up is a bullet hell masterpiece with a boss rush twist. With 10 epic battles and old-school graphics, you'll need expert shooting skills to survive. Customizable health and Assist Mode make it accessible to all.

name: Assassin: The First List
description: Assassin is a stealth action game in which information is power. Become the master assassin, taking on the role of a highly-trained agent who's been sent to eliminate a group of targets from around the world. They will never know what hit them.

name: The Last of Us Part I: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Experience the emotional storytelling and unforgettable characters in The Last of Us, winner of over 200 Game of the Year awards.

name: Lab Sorters
description: Sin descripción

name: World War Z: Aftermath - Rat Packs Weapon Skins
description: Show those rat hordes that you fear no enemy with the Rat Packs Weapon Skins Bundle, featuring 4 premium rodent-themed skins, one for each weapon.

name: My Demon Wife
description: Beautiful woman became evil, powerful and immortal. She captured you, and made you her husband and slave. You land in a creepy castle with mummies and other monsters running around.

name: The Cycle: Frontier - Authority Peacekeeper Pack
description: A fresh prospector with its various color versions to fit any taste. Suit up with your squad mates to show who's got style. Get your special Operative gear, equip your melee and hop on your drop pods. Plus, a bonus of 1000 Aurum

name: Fortune Follow: The Mansion
description: An exciting game that will take you through an atmosphere of terror and suspense as you solve challenging puzzles to advance through different rooms.

name: Not For Broadcast: Season Pass
description:
Channel One is more than just the news! The Not For Broadcast Season Pass grants to access to all three of the upcoming episodes of Not For Broadcast as they release.

Each episode is a self-contained story, set early into the events of the main game.

name: The Cycle: Frontier - Vivid Party Style Pack
description: An exciting bundle of Vivid weapons and 'goldies' charms to bring your color and style down upon those dare to cross your path on Fortuna III. Plus, a bonus of 1000 Aurum!

name: The Cycle: Frontier - Howler Tamer Bundle
description: Let the competition know who's really the planet's apex predator with this Howler themed vanity pack. Each is precious, each is deadly.. Plus, a bonus of 1000 Aurum

name: World War Z: Aftermath - Deadly Vice Weapon Skins
description: Light up the zombie-filled streets with the Deadly Vice Weapon Skins Pack, featuring 4 premium neon skins, one for each weapon.

name: Kabama
description:
Kabama is a turn-based board game for one or two players.
In Kabama, Players take turns to move, either by placing a counter of their own colour next to one of their existing counters, or by sliding any column or row of the board by exactly one square (touch and slide to do this).
If a player forms a 2x2 square of his / her own colour, those pieces are removed. The winner is the first player to remove all of their pieces from the board.

name: Slime Labs 3
description: Slime is marooned on planet Freezia and needs your help! Explore a frozen lab with slippery ice and new dangerous traps. Slime Labs 3 is a physics based platformer where you control a blob of green ooze that can squish, stretch, shrink, and get frozen. Perfect all the levels while collecting all the lost data disks.

name: Color Mumble
description:
Color Mumble is an Puzzle word game that keeps your brain sizzling.
Your objective:
unscramble as many five-letter words as you can with out running out of time. With two game modality, you will be entertained for hours. In Endless mode, you get 20 seconds to unscramble each word. In Time mode, solve as many words as you can in 3 minutes.

name: Digit God
description:
How fast is your brain? How quick are your fingers? Digit God will tell you.
Digit God is a digit-oriented game designed for your i-Devices. Do math at anytime and anywhere!

name: Tap Quiz
description:
Play Tap Quiz to test your knowledge, practice spelling and word finding skills.
Tap Quiz combines several word game genres and it can be played alone or with a room full of people.
Type answers using letters on the screen. Share the fun by asking family members and friends for help with the answers or the spelling.
As game progresses, questions gradually become more difficult. Please note that all letters on the screen including spaces and punctuation must be used to successfully complete each level.

name: Solitaire 21 Card Sort
description:
Welcome to Solitaire 21 Card Sort, an offline game that requires no ads and collects no data.
The objective of the game is to sort cards and sum up the score to 21 in each round to clear the board. But watch out for the timer and lives - a wrong move costs a life! Make strategic moves to clear levels and unlock new cards, floors, and tables.
Features of Solitaire 21 Card Sort include a simple tap mechanism, a tutorial page to learn the rules of the game, earning game coins each round, hourly game coin rewards, an endless game mode, and a game score board.
To play Solitaire 21 Card Sort, simply sort the cards and add them up to 21. The game comes with a tutorial page - tap the ? to learn the rules of the game.
Get started with Solitaire 21 Card Sort today, a classic card game with a twist!

name: Drag Boat Speed Racing
description:
Build your engine the way you want to! Drag Boat Speed Racing features 100's of different part types resulting in unlimited combinations of ways to make your boat faster!
Drive your boat the way you want to! Weather, wind direction, and chop will affect how straight your hull flies.
Race against opponents across the USA in over 20+ unique locations! Compete for prizes and trophies to claim the title of "World Champion"

name: Touchgrind Scooter
description: Let us present the wildest Touchgrind game so far, Touchgrind Scooter, brought to you by the creators of Touchgrind BMX 2 and Touchgrind Skate 2. We took the core of the Touchgrind brand, listened closely to our players suggestions and feedback and created the most advanced and stunning Touchgrind game yet.

name: 4x4 Offroader
description: 4x4 Offroader is a challenging 2D offroad racing game. The game contains 18 levels of increasing difficulty. Get the car from the start point to the finish line as fast as possible using the forward and back buttons in combination with the two rotate buttons. Sometimes objects must be moved along the way.

name: Slide to Spell
description:
Slide lines or columns of letters to form words spelled
either vertically or horizontally. You want to get the longest words possible.
The game has three modes: hard mode is a nightmare and in easy the game almost plays itself. Quite fascinating to watch, really.

name: Downwordly
description:
Downwordly is a word building game that challenges you to make the most out of the letters you have. Not all letters you see are playable! Use your intellect to find the best word you can make while also planning for the future.
Play against your GameCenter friends in turn-based multiplayer!
Play solo with an endless stack of letters!
Try searching for words in Puzzle mode!
Work your way through a new set of 5 layers of tiles every day in the Daily Challenge!
See how you stack up against your friends and the world on the leaderboards.

name: Woven Words
description:
The Woven Words puzzle grids come in all different shapes and sizes, and when you’re done every row and every column will spell out complete words! Each game board is a mix of letters and blank tiles.
Can you find the right letters for the blank tiles so that every line spells a word both down and across?
The free app includes 6 basic puzzles so you can get your feet wet – and then 12 more challenging puzzles to test your skills. In addition, over five hundred more puzzles are available for purchase.
We’ve worked hard to make Woven Words fully accessible with VoiceOver.

name: Images Quiz
description:
Scratch away as little as possible to unearth the image beneath!
Test your brain, eyes, and fingers with this new and exciting picture quiz! A picture is hidden here . . . but a picture of what? Tap your screen to “scratch” away part of the covering, but be careful—you only have a limited number of scratches! Can you guess what the image is before running out?

name: 8 Bit Pop Quiz
description:
8 Bit Pop Quiz will show freeze frames of classic arcade games. Your job is to identify the name of the game. Use the letters provided to spell out the name. The answer area has blank spaces that will show you how many letters are in each word of the game title.
With each correct answer, you'll earn tokens. Games in the early levels will be easy to identify, but they will get more difficult as you progress. If you need help along the way, the tokens you earn can be used for helps. Helps include revealing letters in the answer or removing letters that aren't used.

name: Sex Standing
description: Sex Standing is a third-person sci-fi shooter. You play as an android girl. You complete missions from the Delivery Hub. Also in the game there are additional tasks for which you get additional buns/ By completing the main missions, you open the adventure map/

name: Fury Roads Survivor
description: Drive your modded vehicle through a post-apocalyptic wasteland and defend yourself from motorized scavengers who want your fuel and flesh.

name: Sudoku Master: Classic Sudoku
description: Classic sudoku - game for your brain! Improve your logical thinking.

name: Bubble Puzzler
description: Bubble Puzzler is a great shoot-a-puzzle game for the whole family!

name: Tormentor
description: Are you ready for an adrenaline-filled adventure? If yes, then it's time to take your weapon and join the ultimate shooting game - Tormentor!

name: Star Chaser
description: Have loads of fun chasing stars and a new high score, all while helping Make-A-Wish UK grant out-of-this-world life-changing wishes for children who need them.

name: JarataireRPG
description: Defeat the demon king with a monster girl as a companion!

name: Learn Words: Use Syllables
description: Learn Words - Use Syllables is an exciting mix between a word and a trivia game. Words are split into colorful syllables and you have to put them back together as fast as possible. More than 100 levels with 8 Languages to learn.

name: Sex Simulator: The Private Jet
description: An interactive sex simulation game with visual novel elements, featuring high-definition graphics and videos with realistic looking characters, set in a beautiful decor. You play the role of a hot businessman, who has sex with three lucky women on the company's private jet.

name: Fall Guys: Neon Nightlife Pack
description: Turn up the neon and jack into cyberspace with these electrifying party punks!

name: Fall Guys: Arcade Classics Pack
description: Grab some quarters and hit start on this retro gaming inspired pack!

name: SoleSurvivor
description: SoleSurvivor is an open-world cooperative sandbox game for single and multiplayer. Players will experience the zombie apocalypse, they will have to deal with it to survive amid difficulties such as saving hostages, searching for resources, water and food, wild animals, survivors with weapons

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Biker Gear Set
description: This content requires the base game Insurgency: Sandstorm on Steam in order to play.Tread on your enemies with the Biker Gear Set for Insurgents. This set contains six different cosmetic gear pieces.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Rust & Wrap Weapon Skin Set
description: This content requires the base game Insurgency: Sandstorm on Steam in order to play.Embody the grizzled fighter within you with the Rust &amp Wrap Weapon Skin Set for Insurgents. These skins can be applied to six different weapons.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Worn Veteran Weapon Skin Set
description: Flaunt your experience with the Worn Veteran Weapon Skin Set for Security. These skins can be applied to six different weapons.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Pilot Gear Set
description: Soar to victory as the maverick you are with the Pilot Gear Set for Security. This set contains five different cosmetic gear pieces.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Accolade Set Bundle
description: This content requires the base game Insurgency: Sandstorm on Steam in order to play.To celebrate 4 years of Sandstorm, and the incredible support from the community, get moving with the Accolade Set Bundle. Featuring premium gear and battle-worn weapon skin sets, the bundle is packed full of community-driven content.

name: Madden NFL 15
description: The PS3 and Xbox 360 versions of Madden NFL 15 received backlash for removing certain features; online team play was the most notable omission, forcing users to play only 1v1 games.

name: The Big Pond
description: Sail a small boat around in the pond

name: The Keyper
description: A new caretaker in an old, mysterious building. Collect keys and unlock the secrets beneath.

name: Sex Gym
description: Sex Gym - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: Galacticare
description: Save the galaxy - one patient at a time! As the new director of Galacticare, you will build and manage a series of hospitals to keep your patients alive for as long as possible - for money! And also because it’s the right thing to do.

name: Madden NFL 16
description: Old gen port of Madden NFL 16.

name: The Alchemist of Ars Magna
description: The main character enters a school and gains experience in research, study, and love. This is the adventure story of an alchemist who grows through encounters and experiences and paves the way.

name: Skullgirls: 2nd Encore - Black Dahlia
description: Carve your way through the Skullgirls cast with your gun-arm, hidden sawblades, and vicious taunts.

name: Tray Racers! Supporter's Pack
description: Show off your style with this cosmetic pack!

name: Golazo! 2: Pixel Soccer
description:
This bundle comes with:
- Golazo! 2
- Golazo! 2 Pixel Stars

name: Family Chess: Amazing Edition
description: This bundle includes 3 DLC skins for the chessboard.

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces: Exotic Travel
description:
This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces". The following 10 puzzle images are included.
- Osaka Castle, Japan
- Phuket, Thailand
- Sanfeng Temple, Taiwan
- Chiang Mai, Thailand
- Lempuyang Temple in Bali, Indonesia
- Ulun Danu Beratan Temple in Bali, Indonesia
- Kuang Si Falls, Laos
- Chefchaouen, Morocco
- Trang An, Vietnam
- Hoi An, Vietnam

name: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys - Director's Cut
description: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys Director's Cut is a fun-centric party game which throws you (along with your friends) into a series of challenges and races throughout randomly generated tracks. Enjoy new decorations and get ready for loads of fun.

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces: Close Up Animals
description:
This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces". The following 10 puzzle images are included.
- Asian small-clawed otter
- Lion
- Koala
- Bengal tiger
- Hedgehog
- Cat
- Red panda
- African bush elephant
- Giant panda
- Ringed seal

name: Brain Memory: Definitive Edition
description: Brain Memory improves on the classic formula of memory games. It lets you increase the difficulty level at your own pace, and customize challenges to one's taste.

name: Bit Orchard: Animal Valley - Platinum Edition
description: This bundle includes various Halloween-themed items and 5 mini games.

name: Mojito the Cat: Easter
description: Enjoy Easter time with an adorable cat named Mojito or one of his friends.

name: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys - Decorations Pack 9
description: Enjoy new decorations in the ninth official DLC.

name: Numbers and Squares
description: Solve different Sudoku puzzles and choose from four different difficulties.

name: The Last Dragon Slayer
description:
Go it alone... Or team up with friends!
Four Heroes arrive on the shores of Baelor, a Kingdom ravaged by the tyrannic rule of a Dragon. In order to defeat this Pagan Idol, you'll first need to scour the deep depths of mysterious dungeons, labyrinthic caves, and lush terrains.

Team up in Local Co-Op gameplay! Find secrets, collect upgrades, and power up on your journey to become the Last Dragon Slayer!

name: Zombie Garden vs. Plants Defence
description: In Zombie Garden & Plants Defense game, you take on the role of the principale character whose mission is to protect her garden from the onslaught of zombies. As you progress through the game, you will need to plant trees strategically and purchase workers who will collect resources like water and wood to help you fend off the zombies.

name: S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope - Premium Edition
description: Play S.N.I.P.E.R., the latest sniping game where you aim, fight and destroy virtual enemies. Try different types of missions, inspired both by classic rail shooters and modern cover shooters. Fight your way out during day and night, destroy evil forces and unlock new weapons and power-ups.

name: The JOTA Collection
description: The Jump Over the Age Collection brings together the critically acclaimed In Other Waters, where you play as an Artificial Intelligence guiding a stranded xenobiologist, and Citizen Sleeper, a gripping adventure inspired by the flexibility and freed

name: Catgotchi: Virtual Pet
description: Welcome to Catgotchi: Virtual Pet, the ultimate game for all cat lovers! Raise and care for your virtual pet. These adorable pixel-art cats are sure to steal your heart!

name: Theatrhythm: Final Bar Line - NieR Pack
description: A pack of additional music tracks to use with Theatrhythm Final Bar Line.

name: Mosaic Chronicles Deluxe: Ultimate Edition
description: Enter a fantastic world full of magic and charm. Rebuild legendary tales with Mosaic Chronicles Deluxe. A new puzzle game experience awaits.

name: Pixel Paint: Definitive Edition
description: Pixel Paint is anything but a classic coloring book. The point of the game is for you to put your mind at ease, follow the numbers and fill every last pixel with a corresponding color.

name: Sherlock Purr: Extended Edition
description: Sherlock Purr is a fun and engaging children's game where players help the feline detective search for hidden objects in an apartment. With colorful graphics, entertaining animations, and brain-teasing puzzles, this game is perfect for young minds who love mysteries and cats. Follow Sherlock Purr's pawprints and solve the mystery today!

name: Sport & Fun: Swimming - Ultimate Edition
description: Discover a new world of fun! Dive into Sport & Fun: Swimming and use your Joy-Con controllers to experience the cutest challenge in your life.

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces: Sweet Cakes
description:
This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces". The following 10 puzzle images are included.
- Strawberry Mousse Cake
- Chocolate Cake
- Fruit Tart
- Raspberry Roll Cake
- Mont Blanc
- Cheese Cake
- Cream Puff
- Matcha Mille-crepe Cake
- Tiramisu
- White Mousse Cake

name: SoulJah Kingdom Rise
description: SoulJah Kingdom Rise is the first look at an upcoming 3rd Person shooter Action-Adventure franchise. Set in Jamaica in the year 2093, play as Akan and experience the first look at the world of SKR. Complete objectives, find secrets and clean the streets.

name: Bullet Blaze
description: In Bullet Blaze, players take on the role of a heroic warrior with multiple bullet types, traversing obstacles and enemies, protecting peace and saving the world.

name: Noel the Mortal Fate: Season 12
description: This is the tale of a girl who loses everything in her deal with a devil and her quest for revenge. Finally, the popular game has entered its final chapter! In S12, which serves as the prologue to the "Final Battle Arc," the story of Caron and Burrows begins to take a major turn...

name: Train Simulator Classic: Wasatch Grade Scenario Pack 01
description: Experience all the appeal, excitement, and challenges of Union Pacific railroading during the remarkable 1960s - with Wasatch Grade Scenario Pack 01 for Train Simulator Classic!

name: Demons Infernalize
description: Demons Infernalize is a bullet hell survival game with minimalistic gameplay .Fight as a fire spirit in the magical snow planet. Survive as long as you can until your soul goes out. Burn those ice people and complete the levels, upgrade yourself, become the true survivor in the magical snow planet.

name: Lemmings & Oh No! More Lemmings
description: This port saw the same enhanced graphics and UI upgrade from their respective standalone ports return, as well as the higher quality music. However, an intro is absent.

name: The Coffin of Andy and Leyley
description: In The Coffin of Andy and Leyley, you follow the story of Andrew and Ashley, siblings who have been quarantined in their house for months and are slowly starving to death. Everyone in the building appears to have contracted a contagious disease and are now locked in their apartments by armed guards. The guards do keep promising to bring food, but none ever comes, so eventually they have to resort to drastic measures.

name: Hair Nah
description: Hair Nah is a travel game about a black woman who is tired of people touching her hair that originated as the answer to a brief: "What are stresses that Black women face and how can we address them?".

name: Suprabac
description:
Do you like the Scattergories game ?
You will love Suprabac !
Compete against your friends and be quick to find the right words !

name: Sex x Hex
description: Sin descripción

name: Memories From Beyond a Coral Sea
description: Explore your way through mystical islands while learning about your characters past. In this short adventure game you play as the protagonist of a memoire, telling a story from the pacific in the late 1800 century.

name: Ultimate Blackball
description: Ultimate Blackball is a simple addicting hyper-casual game that anyone can play.

name: Necogram
description: Necogram is a classical nonogram puzzle game in the company of beautiful neko-women

name: The Murder of Sonic the Hedgehog
description: A brand new Sonic experience from the minds of the Sonic Social team: The Murder of Sonic the Hedgehog is a visual novel, point-and-click adventure! It's Amy Rose's birthday and she's hosting a murder mystery party on the Mirage Express. When Sonic becomes the game's victim, everyone is off to get to the bottom of things. However, something feels a bit off - is this really an innocent game or something more sinister afoot?

name: Pilot Rush
description:
Get ready to soar to new heights in Pilot Rush - Endless Flyer! As a fearless pilot, you'll embark on a non-stop adventure through the skies, dodging obstacles and collecting coins along the way. With intuitive controls and fast-paced action, this game is perfect for gamers of all skill levels.

As you progress through the game, you'll encounter increasingly challenging obstacles and environments, from towering skyscrapers to treacherous mountains. But don't worry – with quick reflexes and a steady hand, you'll be able to navigate through it all.

In addition to the adrenaline-fueled gameplay, Pilot Rush - Endless Flyer also features stunning graphics and a thumping soundtrack that will keep you hooked for hours. And with new challenges, there's always something new to discover.

So what are you waiting for? Download Pilot Rush - Endless Flyer today and get ready for the ultimate high-flying adventure!

name: Mr. Potato Head Activity Pack
description: An educational computer game released in 1997, The Mr. Potato Head Activity Pack was a small collection of game modes where players could express their creativity. Players could draw, use stamps, make greeting cards, dress up Mr. Potato Head, create and solve jigsaw puzzles, and play Connect-The-Dots.

name: Basilisk 2000
description:
Explore an unfinished RPG through its level editor.

The spiritual successor to the unreleased Super Nintendo game Basilisk. This project seemed far more ambitious, but somehow almost became lost media.

Developed around Y2K by an unknown studio, the game was thought to be lost until a fan designed a wrapper program in Unity to load its level editor. Now the potential can finally be seen and its mysteries laid to rest.

name: Marine Tour
description: Sin descripción

name: Phibos
description: Interactive story created and illustrated by Kikuko Watanabe.

name: Metawork: Hotel Simulator
description: Metawork - Hotel Simulator: addictive game to build and manage your own hotel. Customize rooms and offer services to satisfy customers. Test business skills, attract customers, and respond to needs. Realistic graphics and gameplay mechanics. Unlock new features and watch hotel grow. Try now!

name: Secret Agent: Cold War Espionage
description: A stealthy third-person shooter adventure! Use a pistol, binoculars, and high jump mechanics to complete seven thrilling missions, solving puzzles, wiretapping conversations, defusing bombs, and cracking heads!

name: Home Game 3
description:
This adventure-RPG features a bleak world full of secrets within secrets, hectic real-time combat and a custom inventory system of curious items and combinations.

It is about the hermit living with girl.

Exist at home or traverse dangerous realms, seeking Truths and age...

name: The ​Aquarium Does Not Dance
description:
The ​Aquarium Does Not Dance is a Japanese free horror game. The first part was developed in 2021, and the complete version including the second part was released in 2024.

This is a horror adventure game in which a girl who cares for her best friend searches for her friend in an aquarium that has turned into a world of horror. While escaping from the deformed beings called " CREEPY," the player must solve the mysteries hidden in the aquarium.

The horror elements are mild, so players can enjoy solving the challenging riddles. In addition to the main character, the game features unique and attractive girls. The story is multi-ended, and the ending changes depending on your choices.

name: A Day At the Track
description: A horse racing simulator where you bet your players money on the horse to win the race. If your horse wins you get paid. Run the other bots or joined twitch users out of money to be named the victor of the track.

name: Poly Bridge 3
description: The third installment in a series of puzzle-simulation games tasking us with designing and building bridges. Poly Bridge 3 features an expansive campaign, a sandbox mode and custom mod tools support.

name: Halo: Combat Devolved
description: Bungie's iconic first-person shooter, Halo: Combat Evolved, made its debut on the original Xbox in 2001, quickly redefining the shooter genre and what a multiplayer experience meant. Now, over two decades later, a passionate fan is undertaking a monumental project that is sure to excite any Halo fan.

name: Scrapped
description: Get scrap, charge beacons and build unlockable robo-friends to survive!

name: Ride Control Ultimate
description: Ride-Control Ultimate is a simulation-oriented game in which you play as a showman. You start your activity with a small attraction that will allow you to learn how to assemble/disassemble it, animate your turns, customize it and then unlock other increasingly impressive and popular ones among the 16 included in the game!

name: Musical de Primeiro de Abril
description: Rewriting a classic from YTPBR into the Visual Novel genre. Why? What you should be asking is: "Why not?"

name: Froggy Castle
description:
Do you need to get away from your everyday life, and just relax?
Then you are right on target with Froggy Castle! The motto is: “Lets go and destroy the frogs!”

You are on a journey with Pit the hamster to free the kingdom from the dreaded frogs. You will encounter numerous hilarious frogs -- every one requiring a new strategy. To aid your quest, you can find many bonus items and weapons to upgrade your hamster. If you are brave enough, you can unlock new challenges with each game difficultly.

name: Fall Guys: Season 4 - Creative Construction
description:
Creative levels. Custom mayhem.

Fall Guys: Season 4 - Creative Construction adds Fall Guys Creative, an in-game level editor that lets you build custom rounds. Builder Beans can turn our iconic obstacles into chaotic courses and then share them with the community.

name: Froggy Castle 2
description:
Hamster Pit and Princess Patty peer anxiously over the ocean.
A loud croak is heard in the air; the frogs are coming!

Accompany Pit and Patty on numerous levels in a concerted effort to deflate the thick frogs. In this adventure you’ll sail across the seas to meet your biggest challenge on a mysterious volcanic island.

Save the kingdom so that the hamster can sleep peacefully.

name: Charm Studies
description:
Charm Studies is a lo-fi picross game about young witches studying magic. You play as Cassia, an airheaded girl who's currently failing charms class... Luckily, Senna has agreed to tutor her! The only problem is she's not very nice... Can these two little witches learn from each other through the magic of puzzles?

The game includes a small tutorial for those who are new to picross, but you won't fail if you make mistakes either. You can still see all of the story regardless of your picross skills.

name: An Elmwood Trail
description: An interactive mystery game. You play as a private detective trying to solve the disappearance of 18-year-old Zoey Leonard. Using the phone she left behind, you'll investigate her friends, family, and Zoey herself.

name: Suggoi! Arcana Heart 2
description: On October 30th, 2008, this major update had been released to further balance the game and fix some bugs. It also came with some design changed, like new character illustrations, an additional stage, the playable debut of Akane and Nazuna Inuwaka alongside their respective Arcana, new color palettes, and a training mode.

name: Naruto Shinobi Breakdown
description: Naruto shinobi breakdown is a fangame based on the naruto anime series.

name: Ameprod Television Game 10
description:
The Ameprod Television Game 10 is a dedicated first-generation home video game console that was produced in Poland by Elwro from 1978 to 1981, then the production was transferred to PPZ Ameprod.

The TVG-10, thanks to the AY-3-8500 chip, featured six integrated games (Pong, Soccer, Squash, Practice and 2 shooting games), of which without the separately available lightgun called Videotraf only four games were playable.

name: Vessel Damage Control Trainer
description: VESSEL Damage Control Trainer provides training on damage control skills within the interior of a simulated Arleigh Burke class destroyer. It focuses on learning objectives that directly support the Recruit Training Command curriculum and embeds training within a story that promotes score values, provides a relevant context and reinforces the culture of the service. The game reinforces decision-making, communication protocol, situational awareness and shipboard navigation. Players navigate within a virtual ship, performing typical game actions, such as opening doors, inspecting objects, collecting personal equipment, and using damage control tools. The game provides information resources and feedback designed to help students of different levels succeed.

name: A Shard of Mine
description: Who is Luna? Where is she? Why is this all your fault? Venture into a cursed land and find more about this mystery!

name: Suggoi! Arcana Heart 2
description:
On October 30, 2008, Examu released a major update to Arcana Heart 2 called Suggoi! Arcana Heart 2. This version further balanced the game and fixed some bugs. It also featured some design changes, such as new character illustrations and a red redesign for Kaya Hirotaka. New additions included an additional stage; three new characters: Akane Inuwaka, Nazuna Inuwaka, and Parace L'Sia; their respective Arcana: Fenex (Sound), Kayatsuhime (Flower), Parace L'sia (Life); new color palettes for each character, available by pressing the Start button on the character select screen; and an additional training mode. Suggoi! Arcana Heart 2 was further updated to version 2.6 on February 27, 2009.

AQ Interactive handled the PlayStation 2 port of Suggoi! Arcana Heart 2, which was released only in Japan on April 9, 2009. It was planned for a worldwide release but was cancelled due to low sales of the first one, as well as poor performance and slowdown in gameplay, making the port weaker than the arcade perfect port of the first one.

name: Um Jammer Lammy Now
description:
Um Jammer Lammy Now!, also known as simply the Um Jammer Lammy Arcade version, was an arcade cabinet that allowed players to play Um Jammer Lammy in versus mode using controllers designed as guitars; a concept later adopted by the Guitar Hero franchise.

With the help of Namco, Sony of Japan released an arcade version of Um Jammer Lammy which had updated graphics and new songs in addition to the original songs.

This 2-player arcade cabinet converts the PlayStation title into an arcade experience with a set of realistic guitar controllers. The game features three difficulty levels, three playable characters, and three game modes (Solo, Team and Battle).

It was fully discovered by r/Parappa subreddit in early 2023.

name: Ragnarok Tactics
description:
Ragnarök Tactics is a tactical mobile game based on Ragnarok Online.

The international servers closed their servers on May 18 of 2022 after a scant 2 years of operation.

name: Thinkin' Science: Zap!
description:
It is a dark and stormy night as you step backstage to be guest director at the Wonder Dome, the world-famous auditorium of light, sound, and electricity. But great zotz! The theater has been zapped by lightning, and the Laser Control System is on the fritz! Can you learn all about light, sound and electricity to rescue the show?

Using your own mental powers and some help from zany ZAP! stars Blaze, Surge and Riff, apply the principles of science to set up and test experiments with lasers, sound waves and circuits. Then, orchestrate your own wacky electro-laser-sound concerts!

name: Pet Pad
description: Pet Pad was a digital pack-in game with LeapPad Explorer consoles that allowed you to have a virtual pet.

name: Luna Sonata
description:
Vampire, with his dangerous charm; Werewolf, who's big, fluffy and cute; Hunter, the guy you can always count on; Doctor, a smart man with a warm heart.
Who will be the man that will move your heart?

Go on dates to unlock CGs, increase affinity and unlock good endings!

name: Twisted Lovestruck
description:
"If you want to go back, run before the moon rises!"

Deep in the forest where humans can’t step, here "they" are! Twisted Lovestruck: fantasy romance, find out the secrets hidden underneath the forbidden forest! Meet the love endings that depend on your choices!

name: Katamari Damacy Mobile
description:
Katamari Damacy Mobile (塊魂モバイル, Katamari Damashii Mobairu, lit. "Clump Spirit Mobile") is a video game developed by Namco Bandaifor the Mitsubishi P904i series of mobile phones for NTT DoCoMo. It was released in June 2007 in Japan. It is a spin-off of the "Katamari Series", the second game on a portable system and the third game produced without the involvement of series creator Keita Takahashi.

This version of the game uses a unique method of control, by making use of a software technology called GestureTek EyeMobile to make phones capable of detecting vibration via the built in camera on the P904i. The player is able to move the katamari ball forward, backwards, left and right by merely tilting the phone.

There are also traditional controls as an option to the default motion controls.

Katamari Damacy Mobile will come pre-installed on P904i model phones. Other phone models need to download the game through the Namco Games channel.

name: Katamari Damacy-Kun
description: Katamari Damacy-Kun (塊魂くん lit, Katamari Damashii-Kun) is a Japanese-only mobile phone game that was distributed on i-mode, Yahoo! Kentai, and EZweb. It's a 2D Katamari game based on the ending 8-bit minigame from Me & My Katamari. Along with including the original levels from M&MK, it has many unique stages as well. Also included is a story (much like the one the original Katamari Damacy had) and a Collection, where you can look at rolled up items. This has a few new modes, including a tutorial and the Story Mode. Apparently, something of interest happens after completing the collection.

name: Rolling with Katamari
description:
Rolling With Katamari was an official, early mobile Katamari game from Namco Network. It has the style of a pseuedo retro game.

The game featured 30 stages with presents to collect and multiple achievements to earn.

name: Oi Katamari Damacy-Kun
description: Oi Katamari Damacy-Kun (オーイ塊魂くんlit, Oi Katamari Damashii-Kun) is the sequel to Katamari Damacy-Kun. This game had new additions, such as a non-autoscroll stage, the ability to play as different cousins, and the story appears to be based around gacha toys. The total number of playable levels in the sequel is 24.

name: Katamari Damacy Mobile+
description:
On November 17, 2011, an Android port of the original Katamari Damacy was released in Japan. There are scarce details outside of those present on Matrixsoft.

It's uncertain what changes if any were made when Katamari Damacy Mobile+ was released. It is clear though that game was adapted to work on smartphones.

name: Katamari Damacy Mobile 2
description: Katamari Damacy Mobile 2 was released on the Apple Store on March 8, 2012. Katamari Damacy Mobile 2 was a Japanese iOS exclusive that can't be downloaded anymore.

name: Typing Tempo
description: Typing Tempo is a 41-key 2D typing rhythm game developed by Rainbeat Games.

name: Poostall Royale
description: Don't let the title fool you, this isn't a battle royale game. Maybe this isn't even a game at all...

name: Super Pokémon Eevee Edition
description:
This fanmade game combines classic Pokémon games with a Final Fantasy-inspired gameplay system that offers completely unique pokemon adventure.

It has varied lineup of features including an active battle system that allows your party of four Pokemon to battle at once, an equipment system to customize your pokemon, legendary summons to assist you in battle and pokemon that have infinite movesets so you never have to forget a move.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles HD
description: This humble, fan-made remaster tries to be 100% faithful to the original, although, the first step to create it was 4 years ago, the total development time, is about 8 or 9 months (5/6 hours a day). My wish is to the full game, 100% clone, but, it still not.

name: Terrordactyl Carnivore
description:
Terrordactyl Carnivore is a thrilling dinosaur action adventure game! Fly your pterodactyl through a treacherous ravine to rescue lost cars from a prehistoric time-warp.

Defeat all pterodactyls by landing on top of them to advance to the next level. Munch all orbs before they turn into pterodactyls. Use the arrow keys to control your pterodactyl: up - gain altitude, left and right - forward and back. Use the space bar to breathe fire. Collect power ups to enhance your pterodactyl's flight (extra life, force field, super speed, destroy all, anti-gravity).

name: Čendovy Patálie
description:
New Czech short story. The game takes place in Prague and also in Chotěbor. In the game you will encounter Czech dubbing. If you like the Polda game series, you will definitely enjoy this game.

The main character is Čenda, who is a bit of a jerk. He is a famous detective who solves all kinds of cases. But before you solve the main mystery, you have a lot to think about. The game also contains a few minigames.

This game was made as a school project.

name: Vampire Survivors: Tides of the Foscari
description: Tides of the Foscari will be the second DLC expansion for Vampire Survivors, introducing another huge stage as well as a slate of new characters, monsters and weapons to play with. And of course, secrets may be lurking in the shadowed canopies of the deep forest… But as always we can neither confirm nor deny the presence of vampires.

name: New Super Mario Bros. Wii: American Mario Revolution
description: This is a custom mario game, featuring our favorite plumber saving Princess Peach yet another time! Join forces with Luigi and the blue and yellow toads to take down confederate Bowser!

name: Shogi!
description: Shogi! Experience the ultimate 3D Shogi video game! Featuring stunning graphics, and a cutting-edge AI that brings the Japanese chess game to life like never before. Master the art of Shogi, a chess-like tabletop experience, and become a true champion of the popular strategic game.

name: Koewotayorini SP
description: Koewotayorini SP is an adventure game. SP is short for Second Partner, this game is sequel to Koewotayorini.

name: Koewotayorini: Last Game
description: Koewotayorini: Last Game is an adventure game. The goal of the game is to escape 2000 passengers on the ship.

name: Five Nights at Glitchsakens: Jankest Delivery
description:
Play the role of a disgruntled paranormal investigator, called out by his client to an old Fazbear Delivery Service factory, where there's been reports of something lurking around the building, still alive and functional despite years of closure.

Find his secrets, and live to tell His untold story.

Welcome to Glitchsakens Factory.

name: Portal-ban
description: Sin descripción

name: F1 GP
description: Sin descripción

name: Isekai Mario
description: Isekai Mario is an unofficial freeware fan game that adds anime characters to the world of Super Mario. You can play as hundreds of different anime characters and collect hundreds of power stars in this 3d platformer.

name: Street Fighter Alpha 2
description: The PlayStation port of Street Fighter Alpha 2 features an arranged soundtrack and Shin Akuma as a selectable character via a secret code.

name: Street Fighter Alpha 2
description: The Sega Saturn port of Street Fighter Alpha 2 uses an arranged soundtrack and features new characters like Shin Akuma, Evil Ryu, EX Dhalsim and EX Zangief. It also includes an exclusive survival mode as well as an art gallery.

name: Street Fighter Alpha 2
description: The SNES port of Street Fighter Alpha 2 had to lower the quality of graphics and audio because of the power of the machine. This version also have loading times when entering matches while sounds are loaded onto the sound chip. Unlike the PlayStation and Saturn versions, the only secret characters available to the player are the classic-style Chun-Li and Shin Akuma.

name: Team Fortress 2 Vintage
description: Team Fortress 2 Vintage is a Source 2013 modification based off of Team Fortress 2 Classic as a re-imagining of retail TF2, focusing on being a museum to the game.

name: Communite
description: Communite is a wholesome, cozy, multiplayer city builder based on kindness and co-operation. Restore life, unlock new tiles, and work together to rescue adorable creatures to join your world and make it grow!

name: Of Them That Have a Name
description: A short game about memorials.

name: Joy and Me
description: Joy and me is a horror video game saga with events based on real events. Each chapter of the saga has things based on real events, both personal and paranormal problems, this saga has been developing for 7 years, and is practically almost ready for its premiere.

name: Breath of the Wild Multiplayer
description:
An online multiplayer mod for The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild.
Its development started due to the streamer PointCrow offering U$10,000 for a modder to make an online multiplayer mod for The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild with some conditions, like being the first to stream and that the project needed to be finished before the release of the sequel (Tears of the Kingdom, known as Breath of the Wild 2 at that time).
Breath of the Wild Multiplayer Team, lead by modder AlexMangue, took on the challenge and released the mod in April 4th, 2023.
Since then, PointCrow started streaming the mod and recording videos of it, but Nintendo decided to take down his videos. The mod is currently unavailable for download and unsupported, as a prevention from legal actions by Nintendo.

developers.name: Breath of the Wild Multiplayer Team

name: Decimate Drive
description: Try escaping a killer car infested city. Decimate Drive combines atmospheric horror with engaging gameplay, while taking inspiration from 70s & 80s car-themed horror movies.

name: Disposition
description: Race along a coastline as strange hostile entities chase you down. Try to reach your destination as fast as you can but don't lose control. Disposition is an attempt to combine racing with horror elements.

name: LEGO World Builder
description: World Builder is a Shockwave puzzle-platformer that was hosted on the official LEGO website in 2002. The player must collect LEGO pieces and the recipes that allow them to assemble those pieces into different kinds of units and vehicles. Each unit type has its own capabilities, allowing the player access new areas and collect more pieces and recipes.

name: 2K Essentials Collection
description: The 2K Essentials Collection features the groundbreaking originals Bioshock and Borderlands as well as the highly acclaimed XCOM: Enemy Unknown. A must have collection for any game library.

name: Lavender Link
description: Rika is stuck in a dead-end career as the janitor of a dreary research facility in space. What do they research? She couldn't care less. Not until her concern for a co-worker pulls her into some sinister circumstances.

name: Mobile Suit Gundam Extreme Vs. 2 OverBoost
description: Sin descripción

name: Chao Bandstand
description: Something has stolen the chao's precious instruments for their little bandstand. Who could've done such a thing!? It's up to a small little rabbit to go and find them. Six music boxes to find, find the thief and make the poor little chao happy once again!

name: Guitar Hero 64
description: Ever wanted to play Guitar Hero in a Super Mario 64 hack? Probably not, but here it is anyway.

name: Bowsette Cave Escape
description: Oh no! Bowsette is in a collapsing cave and you need to help her escape!

name: 100% Challenge
description: Action arcade! Capture enemies of your color and avoid the rest to become the best in the world! Fast, addictive and 100% challenging!

name: Blueprint 3D
description: Each level begins with a mysterious clutter of seemingly chaotic dots and lines. Underneath all the chaos, however, lies a beautiful blueprint image waiting to be uncovered. It’s right there in front of you: Just drag your finger across the screen to rotate the figure, and all of a sudden you’ll notice that the lines start to make sense! Solve the puzzle by rotating the figure in all directions and on all planes until you hit the sweet spot. Once you’re there, the secret picture will reveal itself. Wait till you see this in action!

name: R.C.T. Eizou Play
description: Interactive game featuring Nemoto Harumi, Kobayashi Emi, Mori Hiroko, Kitagawa Tomomi, Igarashi Yuka: gravure idols from the R.C.T. group. The player can watch a series of videos of bikini model photoshoots from different perspectives and record clips of the shown footage.

name: Vanishing Shadow
description: Game contentPlay as 12 characters, switch between each other in place, and experience a high degree of freedom of gameplay. Ride horses and bicycles, drive sports cars and helicopters to stay up late in beautiful nature.[

name: Witch Race
description: "Witch Race" is a lightweight Rogue Auto Chess game, which tells the dark era of the Fantasy World Isefa continent. Strategic formation of army, unlock heroes, make good use of arms and powerful combination skills. Witness the final fate of Witch Race and understand the truth behind the story.

name: Snake
description: Snake is a massively multiplayer online 3D action game with a third-person view. The objective of the game is to control a cute snake (or snakes) around a map and eat apples, defeating other players to grow the largest and longest in the game.

name: Terminal Velocity
description: Terminal Velocity is an escape flight game. The pace of the game is very tight. The player's goal is to survive as much as possible.

name: Darkside
description: An online hacking game with no limits in a multiplayer only world. The objective of the game is to increase your wealth by any means necessary and upgrade your gear but beware, people will rip you apart

name: Vegan Challenge
description: Action, 2D platform game. You start the game with an overweight character. The evil meat enemies, traps and minigames want to stop you. The ultimate goal lose weight and get fitter. Are you ready for the challenge?

name: Vehicle Beat Zombie
description: Zombie incoming,fortunately,we got plenty of vehicle to use,armed with multiple weapons,avoid attacked by zombie by driving vehicles,open landscape give you advantage to take vantage point,use weapons to hit them,grenades ,firegrenade are handy,you can upgrade weapons to gain more chance to win.

name: Veni, Vidi, Vici
description: Dispel the world's corruption by befriending magical creatures through rhythm-based dance combat!

name: Vertex Rush
description: Vertex Rush - A Fast-Paced Climbing Adventure!

name: Video Horror Society: Anomaly
description: Expand your monster roster with our most spine chilling monstrosity yet. The shapeshifting Anomaly introduces an all new paranoia-inducing playstyle that will have your foes shaking in their snow boots... Trust no one.

name: Waifu Puzzles
description: This is a funny puzzle game where you need build anime girls from scattered fragments of a picture.

name: White Wolf: Darkside Chronicles
description: Enter Darkside of "White Wolf" story how evil got trapped in chest in snow cave. When you opened chest you felled into magic dream realm spell to enter "White Wolf" mind to corrupt into "Dark Wolf. Let evil adventure begin!

name: Wojak Wants Hentai
description: Fight the furies to gain access to a naughty gallery!Elon gives you missions to unlock Skins.Get help from Trump.And find many secrets.

name: WW2: Bunker Simulator - Hunting Wild
description: Hunting season has officially begun, and herds of animals have been spotted near the Bunker! Grab your favorite rifle, military knife, and hunt to refill your food resources. Intelligence reports empty sandbags started to appear in enemy convoys!

name: Urban Cards: Christmas Faction
description: Play this while stuffing your face with the fortieth cookie. Play this while escaping your cousin who wants to explain bitcoin and your uncle with his opinions about inclusive language. Play this while feeling cozy in your ugly sweater and looking scaredly at that unopened gas bill.

name: VDSC Battle Royal
description: An Island, a bunch of dragons and guns. Volt Inu's Sailor Club invites you to the greatest battle of your life. Fight 24 other players for Honor, Wealth and Power. Land in strategic locations, loot weapons and supplies to survive the battlegrounds and be the last to be victorious.

name: The Thieves!
description: The time has come to see how hard you worked at the gym!

name: Things to Get
description: In this game, the user must pick up objects that will help him and solve the puzzles and finish the tasks. With each finished task the user will go to the next level. The user must look for objects that will help him solve the puzzles.

name: T.I.MO
description: T.I.MO is a 2D puzzles game point and click, where the gamer shall control three characters and according to each way of watching every reality must solve the puzzle (riddles) for helping the monsters for return their homes

name: Tribal Legends
description: Welcome to Tribal Legends, an epic 2D cartoon-style shooter in which you play as a young tribal archer.

name: Tribe Dash
description: Tribe Dash is a Stone Age time management simulator! Hunt, collect resources, and search for treasure on lost islands playing as the leader of a Stone Age tribe in this exciting adventure game!

name: The Test: Secrets of the Soul 2
description: You will answer questions that will reveal things deep within. Some will be uncomfortable, but with great knowledge comes great sacrifice. Can you make it all the way through The Test, and are you SURE you want the answers you seek? For it is time to once again unlock "Secrets of the Soul..."

name: The RailIdle
description: Run the rails at the base, collect materials, and use them to head out on your adventure. The rails run automatically, so you can leave them alone! The further you advance, the more side content you unlock!

name: The Last Saintess
description: The offensive of the undead begins. Gather holy power to summon soldiers and strengthen the starlight of Hellendil to defeat the undead.
